mapper.select: SELECT rl.rentallistid, rl.rentdate, rl.plannedreturndate, rl.isbn, rl.memberid, rl.subscrlistid, rl.actualreturndate, rl.deliverydate, rl.deliveryinvno, b.title, b.bookimgurl FROM rentallist rl LEFT JOIN book b ON rl.isbn = b.isbn ORDER BY rl.rentdate DESC

SELECT rl.rentallistid, rl.rentdate, rl.plannedreturndate, rl.isbn, rl.memberid, rl.subscrlistid, rl.actualreturndate, rl.deliverydate, rl.deliveryinvno, b.title, b.bookimgurl FROM rentallist rl LEFT JOIN book b ON rl.isbn = b.isbn ORDER BY rl.rentdate DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT rl.rentallistid, rl.rentdate, rl.plannedreturndate, rl.isbn, rl.memberid, rl.subscrlistid, rl.actualreturndate, rl.deliverydate, rl.deliveryinvno, b.title, b.bookimgurl FROM rentallist rl LEFT JOIN book b ON rl.isbn = b.isbn WHERE rl.rentallistid = #{rentallistid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rentallist (rentdate, plannedreturndate, isbn, memberid, subscrlistid, actualreturndate, deliverydate, deliveryinvno) VALUES (#{rentdate}, #{plannedreturndate}, #{isbn}, #{memberid}, #{subscrlistid}, #{actualreturndate}, #{deliverydate}, #{deliveryinvno})
